description:
Our hand wrought iron pieces are made for us in the Lancaster County, PA. Amish Community. With classic style and functional design, these versatile pieces blend into most decorating schemes. This is solid iron--not wire. These pieces are finished in satin black and work well in any room. 

This pie stand will hold 10-12 inch pie plates and fits the basket people's pottery pie plates. The inside ring dimension is 9 1/4 inches. There is 12 inches between the uprights. The picture shows all three sizes of available pie stands. 

This listing is for the Triple PIE STAND which is 16 1/2 inches wide and 17 1/2 inches to the top.
title: Wrought Iron Pie Stand/Rack Triple Tier Hand Made
